TopicTitle: Is there ever going to be a dedicated console tutorial/help section?

Articles.Content:
PS4, CONSOLE.

I haven't played the enhanced edition much at all,  just decided to.

Wow, this game needs work.

Sad to say but this game dies on console because these forums are effectively unsearchable.
How much different would it be? I'm not against it. Just asking if it's needful and helpful.
